anathema: Dam a river, disrespect sincere gifts of water or drink, pollute clean bodies of water
edict: Change to avoid stagnation, promote life and growth, respect and aid the flow of natural cycles, swim
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Lysianassa (Empress of the Torrent)](/Deities.aspx?ID=692)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 306

Lysianassa, Empress of the Torrent, is the elemental lord of currents, tides, and water. The benevolent lord of water patrols her plane as a powerful sailfish made of coral and streaked with mother of pearl, creating the ocean’s currents in her wake. Lysianassa tends to the tides and their victims, cultivating change and nurturing the growth that water so often provides. Fearful of stagnancy after a long imprisonment, she races the waves of her own creation and encourages others to do the same.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Elemental Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=8)

**Edicts** Change to avoid stagnation, promote life and growth, respect and aid the flow of natural cycles, swim

**Anathema** Dam a river, disrespect sincere gifts of water or drink, pollute clean bodies of water

**Area of Concern**
Currents, flow, oceans, tides, water

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49)

**Favored Weapon** [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=365)

**Domains** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=102), [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=75), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=98)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Dreams](/Domains.aspx?ID=72), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Time](/Domains.aspx?ID=121)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Hydraulic Push](/Spells.aspx?ID=1561)

- **3rd**
[Aqueous Orb](/Spells.aspx?ID=1443)

- **5th**
[Control Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=1473)

</column>
